Name: Dance Fight
About the game: Dance Fight is a Beat 'em Up Brawler Game, Also with Cool Dance Moves ! - Single Player (Player vs AI) - Hand-to-Hand combat - Kickboxing Style - Enemy AI - Several Moves - Combos that take precise timing to execute moves - For example forward/forward/Y gamepad button will perform the super punch - Throw - You can pick your opponent up by the neck and slam their head into the ground - 2.5D Side View - Several Challenging Levels Use WADS or Left Thumbstick to Move Use JKLI (Keyboard) OR ABXY (Gamepad) to Hit/Kick 9 Key or Left Shoulder to Block - Features Fun Dance Moves (Use D-PAD or Arrow Keys) * NOTE : ALL Videos & Music are from Copyright Free Sources *
Meta Title: Dance Fight: Dec 8, 2022, Archor Wright and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dance Fight? Check out the release date (Dec 8, 2022), developer insights from Archor Wright, and a complete game summary.
